steps.name: Stage 0: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETE - Remove all Components using DELETE.
Stage 1: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETEnoComponents - Attempt to remove all Components using DELETE when none are present.
Stage 2: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETnoComponents - Retrieve an empty set of Components using GET.
Stage 3: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnode - Create a Node Component using POST.
Stage 4: hsmAPIstateComponentsGET - Retrieve all Components using GET after a Node Component has been created.
Stage 5: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETidParamNode - Retrieve a specific Node Component using the ID query parameter.
Stage 6: hsmAPIstateComponentsPUTnodeExistsNoForce - Update an existing Node Component using PUT without the force option.
Stage 7: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNode - Retrieve the updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 8: hsmAPIstateComponentsPUTnodeExistsForce - Update an existing Node Component using PUT with the force option.
Stage 9: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNode - Retrieve the updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 10: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETExname - Remove a specific Node Component using DELETE.
Stage 11: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETExnameMissing - Attempt to remove a specific Node Component that doesn't exist using DELETE.
Stage 12: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETidMissingNode - Attempt to retrieve a specific Node Component that doesn't exist using GET.
Stage 13: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNidGETmissingNid - Attempt to retrieve a specific Node Component by NID that doesn't exist using GET.
Stage 14: hsmAPIstateComponentsPUTdoesntExistNoForce - Create a Component using PUT for a Node that doesn't already exist.
Stage 15: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNode - Retrieve the Node Component using GET that was created by the previous PUT.
Stage 16: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETE - Remove all Components again using DELETE.
Stage 17: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodeBMC - Create a NodeBMC Component using POST.
Stage 18: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodeBMCexistsNoForce - Attempt to create a different NodeBMC Component using POST with an existing ID without the force option.
Stage 19: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNodeBMC - Retrieve the NodeBMC Component using GET and verify it was not overwritten by the previous POST.
Stage 20: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodeBMCexistsForce - Create a different NodeBMC Component using POST with an existing ID and the force option.
Stage 21: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNodeBMC - Retrieve the NodeBMC Component using GET and verify it was overwritten by the previous POST.
Stage 22: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodes - Create multiple Node Components with a variety of valid field values using POST.
Stage 23: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodeEnclosure - Create a NodeEnclosure Component using POST.
Stage 24: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTrouterBMCandRouterModule - Create RouterBMC and RouterModule Components using POST.
Stage 25: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTchassisAndChassisBMC - Create Chassis and ChassisBMC Components using POST.
Stage 26: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSThsnBoardandCabinetPDUController - Create HSNBoard and CabinetPDUController Components using POST.
Stage 27: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamCabinetPDUController - Retrieve the CabinetPDUController Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 28: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamChassisBMC - Retrieve the ChassisBMC Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 29: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamChassis - Retrieve the Chassis Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 30: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamHSNBoard - Retrieve the HSNBoard Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 31: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamNodeBMC - Retrieve the NodeBMC Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 32: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamNodeEnclosure - Retrieve the NodeEnclosure Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 33: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamNode - Retrieve the Node Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 34: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamRouterBMC - Retrieve the RouterBMC Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 35: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETtypeParamRouterModule - Retrieve the RouterModule Component using GET and the type query parameter.
Stage 36: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamUnknownStateOnly - Retrieve Unknown Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 37: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamEmpty - Retrieve Empty Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 38: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamPopulated - Retrieve Populated Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 39: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamOff - Retrieve Off Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 40: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamOn - Retrieve On Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 41: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamStandby - Retrieve Standby Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 42: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamHalt - Retrieve Halt Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 43: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateParamReady - Retrieve Ready Components using GET and the state query parameter.
Stage 44: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagParamOKflagOnly - Retrieve OK Components using GET and the flag query parameter.
Stage 45: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagParamWarning - Retrieve Warning Components using GET and the flag query parameter.
Stage 46: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagParamAlert - Retrieve Alert Components using GET and the flag query parameter.
Stage 47: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagParamLocked - Retrieve Locked Components using GET and the flag query parameter.
Stage 48: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamComputeRoleOnly - Retrieve Compute Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 49: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamService - Retrieve Service Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 50: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamSystem - Retrieve System Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 51: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamApplication - Retrieve Application Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 52: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamStorage - Retrieve Storage Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 53: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleParamManagement - Retrieve Management Components using GET and the role query parameter.
Stage 54: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETsubroleParamMaster - Retrieve Master Components using GET and the subrole query parameter.
Stage 55: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETsubroleParamWorker - Retrieve Worker Components using GET and the subrole query parameter.
Stage 56: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETsubroleParamStorage - Retrieve Storage Components using GET and the subrole query parameter.
Stage 57: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETenabledParamTrue - Retrieve Enabled Components using GET and the enabled query parameter.
Stage 58: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETenabledParamFalse - Retrieve Disabled Components using GET and the enabled query parameter.
Stage 59: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETsoftwarestatusParamTestStatus - Retrieve Components with a specific SoftwareStatus using GET and the softwarestatus query parameter.
Stage 60: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETarchParamX86 - Retrieve X86 Components using GET and the arch query parameter.
Stage 61: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETarchParamARM - Retrieve ARM Components using GET and the arch query parameter.
Stage 62: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETarchParamOther - Retrieve Other Components using GET and the arch query parameter.
Stage 63: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETclassParamRiver - Retrieve River Components using GET and the class query parameter.
Stage 64: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETclassParamMountain - Retrieve Mountain Components using GET and the class query parameter.
Stage 65: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETclassParamHill - Retrieve Hill Components using GET and the class query parameter.
Stage 66: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETnidParamNidOnly - Retrieve a Component with a specific NID using GET and the nid query parameter.
Stage 67: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETnidStartParam - Retrieve Components with NIDs starting at a specific value using GET and the nid_start query parameter.
Stage 68: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETnidStartNidEndParams - Retrieve Components with NIDs starting and ending at specific values using GET with the nid_start and nid_end query parameters.
Stage 69: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETManyParamsExistingNode - Retrieve Components with specific values of many query parameters using GET.
Stage 70: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTexistingComponent - Query for existing Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 71: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTtypeNodeExistingComponent - Query for existing Node Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 72: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTstateReadyStateOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Ready Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 73: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTflagOkFlagOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing OK Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 74: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTenabledTrueExistingComponent - Query for existing Enabled Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 75: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTsoftwareStatusExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with a specific SoftwareStatus and ComponentID using POST.
Stage 76: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTroleComputeExistingComponent - Query for existing Compute Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 77: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTsubRoleMasterExistingComponent - Query for existing Master Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 78: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTarchX86ExistingComponent - Query for existing X86 Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 79: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTclassRiverExistingComponent - Query for existing River Components with a specific ComponentID using POST.
Stage 80: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTnidNidOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with a specific NID and ComponentID using POST.
Stage 81: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTnidStartExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific ComponentIDs and NIDs starting at a specific value using POST.
Stage 82: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTnidStartNidEndExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific ComponentIDs as well as NIDs starting and ending at a specific value using POST.
Stage 83: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryPOSTmanyParametersExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific ComponentIDs and many specific attributes using POST.
Stage 84: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTexistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 85: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTtypeNodeExistingComponent - Query for existing Node Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 86: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTstateReadyStateOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Ready Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 87: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTflagOkFlagOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing OK Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 88: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTenabledTrueExistingComponent - Query for existing Enabled Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 89: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTsoftwareStatusExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID ranges and SoftwareStatus using POST.
Stage 90: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTroleComputeExistingComponent - Query for existing Compute Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 91: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTsubRoleMasterExistingComponent - Query for existing Master Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 92: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTarchX86ExistingComponent - Query for existing X86 Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 93: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTclassRiverExistingComponent - Query for existing River Components with specific NID ranges using POST.
Stage 94: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTnidNidOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID ranges and NID using POST.
Stage 95: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTnidStartExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID ranges and NID start value using POST.
Stage 96: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNIDqueryPOSTmanyParametersExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID ranges and many additional attributes using POST.
Stage 97: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETexistingComponent - Query for existing Components by ID using GET.
Stage 98: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETtypeNodeExistingComponent - Query for existing Node Components by ID using GET with type parameter.
Stage 99: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETstateReadyStateOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Ready Components by ID using GET with state parameter.
Stage 100: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETflagOkFlagOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing OK Components by ID using GET with flag parameter.
Stage 101: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETenabledTrueExistingComponent - Query for existing Enabled Components by ID using GET with enabled parameter.
Stage 102: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETsoftwareStatusExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific SoftwareStatus by ID using GET with softwarestatus parameter.
Stage 103: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETroleComputeExistingComponent - Query for existing Compute Components by ID using GET with role parameter.
Stage 104: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETsubRoleMasterExistingComponent - Query for existing Master Components by ID using GET with subrole parameter.
Stage 105: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETarchX86ExistingComponent - Query for existing X86 Components by ID using GET with arch parameter.
Stage 106: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETclassRiverExistingComponent - Query for existing River Components by ID using GET with class parameter.
Stage 107: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETnidNidOnlyExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID by ID using GET with nid parameter.
Stage 108: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETnidStartExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID start values by ID using GET with nid_start parameter.

Stage 109: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETnidStartNidEndExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with specific NID start and NID end values by ID using GET with nid_start and nid_end parameters.
Stage 110: hsmAPIstateComponentsQueryXnameGETmanyParametersExistingComponent - Query for existing Components with multiple specific attributes by ID using GET with many parameters.
Stage 111: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNidGETnidNodeA - Retrieve an existing Component by NID using GET.
Stage 112: hsmAPIstateComponentsByNidGETnidNodeB - Retrieve a different existing Component by NID using GET.
Stage 113: hsmAPIstateComponentsPOSTnodesForBulkUpdates - Create multiple Node Components for bulk update tests using POST.
Stage 114: hsmAPIstateComponentsBulkStateDataPATCHnodesStateFlag - Bulk update Node Component state and flag values using PATCH.
Stage 115: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkStateDataNodeA - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 116: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkStateDataNodeB - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 117: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNonUpdatedBulkStateDataNode - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was not bulk updated.
Stage 118: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameStateDataPATCHnodeStateNoFlag - Update state data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 119: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETstateonlyParamUpdatedNodeStateData - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET and stateonly parameter.
Stage 120: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagonlyParamUpdatedNodeStateData - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET and flagonly parameter.
Stage 121: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETroleonlyParamUpdatedNode - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET and roleonly parameter.
Stage 122: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETnidonlyParamUpdatedNode - Retrieve the Component data for the updated Node using GET with the nidonly parameter.
Stage 123: hsmAPIstateComponentsBulkFlagOnlyPATCHnodes - Bulk update Node Component flag values using PATCH.
Stage 124: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkFlagOnlyNodeA - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 125: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkFlagOnlyNodeB - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 126: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNonUpdatedBulkFlagOnlyNode - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was not bulk updated.
Stage 127: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameFlagOnlyPATCHnode - Update flag data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 128: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETflagonlyParamUpdatedNodeFlagOnly - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET and flagonly parameter.
Stage 129: hsmAPIstateComponentsBulkEnabledPATCHnodes - Bulk update Node Component enabled values using PATCH.
Stage 130: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkEnabledNodeA - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 131: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkEnabledNodeB - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 132: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNonUpdatedBulkEnabledNode - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was not bulk updated.
Stage 133: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameEnabledPATCHnode - Update enabled data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 134: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedEnabledNode - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 135: hsmAPIstateComponentsBulkSoftwareStatusPATCHnodes - Bulk update Node Component softwarestatus values using PATCH.
Stage 136: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkSoftwareStatusNodeA - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 137: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkSoftwareStatusNodeB - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 138: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNonUpdatedBulkSoftwareStatusNode - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was not bulk updated.
Stage 139: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameSoftwareStatusPATCHnode - Update softwarestatus data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 140: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedSoftwareStatusNode - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 141: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameRolePATCHnode - Update role data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 142: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedSoftwareStatusNode - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 143: hsmAPIstateComponentsBulkNidPATCHnodes - Bulk update Node Component NID values using PATCH.
Stage 144: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkNIDNodeA - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 145: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedBulkNIDNodeB - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was bulk updated.
Stage 146: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameNonUpdatedBulkNIDNode - Retrieve Node Component using GET that was not bulk updated.
Stage 147: hsmAPIstateComponentsXnameNidPATCHnode - Update NID data for specific Node Component using PATCH.
Stage 148: hsmAPIstateComponentsGETxnameUpdatedNIDNode - Retrieve updated Node Component using GET.
Stage 149: hsmAPIstateComponentsDELETE - Remove all Components using DELETE.
